title: Recovering An Account

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So my younger brothers (he's 12) account recently got compromised and has been taken over by someone with clearly not the nicest intentions. We've submited a ticket and nothing's come through yet. Just wanna know if maybe i could be speak with a riot employee in order to get this sorted out asap. 

Much love, Minato

replies.body: Hey just a quick thing to add, add .jpg at the end of your image, yw ;)

Hey Minato,

We tend to avoid diving into Account recovery information on Help & Support since account-specific information is sensitive data. Since you've already submitted a ticket, your best bet is to continue being patient while an account specialist gets back to you. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
